name: styler
description: AI-powered document editing that learns your writing style

scripts.electron:dev: concurrently "npm run dev" "wait-on http://localhost:3000 && NODE_ENV=development electron ."
scripts.electron:build: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); if(fs.existsSync('.env')){fs.renameSync('.env','.env.bak')}" && next build && node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const p=require('path'); const rmrf=(d)=>{if(fs.existsSync(d)){fs.rmSync(d,{recursive:true})}}; rmrf(p.join('.next','standalone','data')); rmrf(p.join('.next','standalone','documents')); console.log('Cleaned user data from standalone build')" && node -e "const fs=require('fs'); if(fs.existsSync('.env.bak')){fs.renameSync('.env.bak','.env')}" && electron-builder
scripts.electron:build:mac: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); if(fs.existsSync('.env')){fs.renameSync('.env','.env.bak')}" && next build && node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const p=require('path'); const rm=(f)=>{if(fs.existsSync(f))fs.rmSync(f,{recursive:true})}; rm(p.join('.next','standalone','.env')); rm(p.join('.next','standalone','data')); rm(p.join('.next','standalone','documents')); console.log('Cleaned sensitive data from build')" && node -e "const fs=require('fs'); if(fs.existsSync('.env.bak')){fs.renameSync('.env.bak','.env')}" && electron-builder --mac
scripts.electron:build:win: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); if(fs.existsSync('.env')){fs.renameSync('.env','.env.bak')}" && next build && node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const p=require('path'); const rm=(f)=>{if(fs.existsSync(f))fs.rmSync(f,{recursive:true})}; rm(p.join('.next','standalone','.env')); rm(p.join('.next','standalone','data')); rm(p.join('.next','standalone','documents')); console.log('Cleaned sensitive data from build')" && node -e "const fs=require('fs'); if(fs.existsSync('.env.bak')){fs.renameSync('.env.bak','.env')}" && electron-builder --win
scripts.electron:build:linux: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); if(fs.existsSync('.env')){fs.renameSync('.env','.env.bak')}" && next build && node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const p=require('path'); const rm=(f)=>{if(fs.existsSync(f))fs.rmSync(f,{recursive:true})}; rm(p.join('.next','standalone','.env')); rm(p.join('.next','standalone','data')); rm(p.join('.next','standalone','documents')); console.log('Cleaned sensitive data from build')" && node -e "const fs=require('fs'); if(fs.existsSync('.env.bak')){fs.renameSync('.env.bak','.env')}" && electron-builder --linux
